name: Gothic Noir Style
description:
My first LoRA, and whew - I love this effect! This is loosely based on Alcina Dimitrescu, and other Gothic/Noir concepts, and produces a beautiful dark "patina" on your images; lots of darkness, high contrast lighting, and stunningly elegant women (with big ol'... youknowwhats). It also pairs well with my Textual Inversion embeddings, as you can see from the sample images.

It's a strong LoRA - you'll likely have to reduce the strength based on your prompt, <lora:GothicNoir:0.6> or <lora:GothicNoir:0.5> work well for most cases.

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
